column3: ## Test Public Search Results Display: Journals
Go to the DOAJ search page at /search/journals
Under 'See journals' facet on the left, click 'With a DOAJ Seal'

column4: All Journals have the DOAJ Seal displayed in the search results

column3: Clear the "Journal has DOAJ Seal" filter
Select any CC licence from this facet

column4: All Journals have the appropriate CC licence displayed in the search results

column3: Select "Publisher's own licence" from that facet

column4: All Journals have the text "Publisher's own license" displayed in the search results

column3: Check the 'Without APCs or other fees' facet

column4: All Journals have 'No charges' displayed in the search results

column3: Find a journals with APCs (Sort on Added to DOAJ (oldest first) to see some)

column4: All journals have 'APCS: amount + currency' displayed in the search results

column3: Look at the first Journal result in your current search results

column4: You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

column3: Click back in your browser window so you are back to the search results

column4: You are taken to the Journal's home page which opens in a new tab
